Uploaded a video to facebook


Actual results:

could not browse until the upload completed


Expected results:

Firefox should have throttled the upload or provide controls to throttle http uploads
comments.creator: danialhorton@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:6.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0
Build ID: 20110811165603

Steps to reproduce:

Uploaded a video to facebook


Actual results:

could not browse until the upload completed


Expected results:

Firefox should have throttled the upload or provide controls to throttle http uploads

i've tried other browsers and don't get this nearly as bad as i do with Firefox

shouldn't the behavior be that the current upload is slowed rather then delaying the page loading?
